content: Great piece. I recently thought of an ad campaign that ran around 17–18 years ago. Theme: banks as the bearers of Third World liberation. It shows a poor, brown-skinned boy, excitedly running through his village, which appears to be in the Middle East. He runs past a group of children and an aerial shot pans on him yelling excitedly, in a heavy accent, as if it were a religious incantation: “ATM! ATM!”
